title: Wo Nkyɛn Ara Nyame, Wo Knyɛn Ara

lines: Wo nkyɛn ara Nyame, Wo nkyɛn ara;
Sɛ asɛnnua mpo na Ͻma me sō a
Me dwom ara ne sɛ Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame Wo nkyɛn ara.
Sɛ mikyinkyin to kwan Ma 'wia kɔtɔ,
Sum duru me so na, Me nnae yɛ bō a,
M'adaeso mu mɛbɛn Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame Wo nkyɛn ara.
Ky'rɛ me kwam, 'namɔn a Wɔde kɔ s'ro;
Nea Wode ma me ny'naa Fi ɔdom mu,
Abɔfo frɛ me ba Wo nkyɛn ara Nyame
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame Wo nkyɛn ara.
Me nyan' fi me nna mu á Meyė W'ayɛ,
Mifi m'aw'rɛhow my Ma Betel so;
Mede 'nigy'na ka sɛ; Wo nkyɛn ara Nyame
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame Wo nkyɛn ara.
Mede nigye ntaban Tu kɔ wim a,
Megyaw 'wia, 'sram, ns'romma Makɔ soro,
Mɛto dwom daā aka sɛ Wo nkyɛn ara Nyame
Wo nkyɛn ara Nyame Wo nkyɛn ara.
